p: Petition for writ of Habeas Corpus
Let the writ whenmable at 3 o'clock P.M. Tuesday May 13th 1852 at the Circuit Court - Stu Buckw..ish
To Mary Ann Scheiber, and Henry Steinberg

You are hereby commanded to bring before the Judge of the St Louis Circuit Court at the Circuit Court Room on the 13th May Inst at 3 o'clock the body of a child named Edward Scheiber, who is illegally detained by you as it is said, and herein jail not inder the pnalties that may fall thereon.
Witness Stephen Rill Clerk of our said Court with the seal thereof, here to affixed at City of St Louis this May Inst A.D. 1862
